titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to mandate a life sentence for repeat sex offenders.
To amend title 18, United States Code, to mandate a life sentence for repeat sex offenders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Amends the Federal criminal code to mandate a life sentence for repeat sex offenders. (Current law provides for a sentence of twice the term otherwise provided for a repeat offender or mandatory life imprisonment for a repeat offense in which a minor was the victim, unless the sentence of death is imposed.)
